No countries have purple on their flag because up until the 1800s purple was

first forbade anyone except close members of the royal family to wear it.

used to produce it the dye initially used to make purple came from the

of the Mediterranean a lot of work went into producing the dye as more than

the Imperial classes of Rome Egypt and Persia purple also came to represent
